title: Eddie Macon`s Run-80`s
description:
Movie Description
A young man who was unjustly imprisoned in Texas makes a last, desperate attempt to escape. A tough, relentless cop pursues him.

Credits 
Cast: Kirk Douglas 
Director: Jeff Kanew 

Synopsis
Wrongly convicted of a crime, Eddie Macon breaks out of his Texas jail cell and heads for the border, in hopes of joining his wife and children in Mexico. In hot pursuit is Marzack, a cop determined to retrieve the escapee.

Because Eddie has no transportation, he has to journey the entire way on foot, and his dangerous trek takes him through the backwoods -- where a strange, deranged family nearly murders him. After managing to flee from this demented trio, Eddie meets up with Jilly Buck, a bored rich gal who agrees to help him reach his destination just because "it&#039;s a slow Wednesday."
